thread.title: Legally bland: Chuck Schumer continues streak of Dems with memory problems
thread.title_full: Legally bland: Chuck Schumer continues streak of Dems with memory problems

author: Doug P.
title: Legally bland: Chuck Schumer continues streak of Dems with memory problems
text:
Legally bland: Chuck Schumer continues streak of Dems with memory problems Posted at 12:24 pm on March 2, 2017 by Doug P. 
As we told you earlier, Sen. Claire McCaskill had some memory problems pertaining to meetings and phone calls that took place in the last few years. This morning, Sen. Chuck Schumer‚Äôs memory issues were of a more personal nature: Schumer just said: "I am not a lawy.." then realized, yes, he is a lawyer. 
Pivoted to say "legal expert." 
‚Äî Jim Swift (@JSwiftTWS) March 2, 2017 
Whoops! 
‚Äî Josh Hammer (@josh_hammer) March 2, 2017 
Frequent lying can make it difficult to remember the truth. @JSwiftTWS I like how the "I'm not a lawyer" bit has become a way to connect yourself to the masses. 
‚Äî Ashley Rae (@Communism_Kills) March 2, 2017 Schumer is fumbling on his lies. Ha ha ha. https://t.co/Tsm0623T6h 
‚Äî Casey Parker (@CaseyParksIt) March 2, 2017 @redsteeze So he's not a lawyer or a legal expert? And yet he's a "lawmaker." That explains a lot. 
‚Äî Karen N (@KarenN101) March 2, 2017 "I'm just a cave man‚Ä¶" https://t.co/8Q5lGw8mZD 
‚Äî Stephen Miller (@redsteeze) March 2, 2017 @redsteeze looking forward to Gov. Cuomo's "I am a lawyer, I am a legal expert, I am a gay hooker, I am Schumer, I am Sessions" speech. 
‚Äî Anthony JamesüêÇ (@AJBulldis) March 2, 2017 So first the former Kentucky gov can't recall if he is Rep or Dem, and Schumer can't recall being a lawyer. Seems they have memory issues. https://t.co/3cGDMwwGPL
